verses.name: John 2:14
verses.text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves, and the changers of money sitting:

verses.name: John 2:15
verses.text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords, he drove them all out of the temple, and the sheep, and the oxen; and poured out the changers’ money, and overthrew the tables;

verses.name: John 2:16
verses.text: And said unto them that sold doves, Take these things hence; make not my Father’s house an house of merchandise.

verses.name: John 2:17
verses.text: And his disciples remembered that it was written, The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.
